title: 10 minutes of daily calls
info:
10 minutes of calls to Pakistan,  Canada, India, and USA for one day at the price of 35 Afghani. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 35 to activate and 35 to deactivate PU to 3378,

title: 25 minutes weekly
info:
25 minutes calls to China  , Canada, India, and America for one week at the price of 75 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. Send W25 to activate and PU W25 to 3378 to deactivate.

title: 50 minutes monthly
info:
50 call minutes  to China, Canada, India, and America for one month for 150 Afghanis. 
Press the green button to activate and the red button to deactivate. 50 to activate and 50 to deactivate PU to 3378  send,
